name: Acting Partners Quiz | Name the Movie | 10 Questions

questions.correct: Apollo 13 & Forrest Gump & The Green Mile
questions.explanation:
Apollo 13 & Forrest Gump & The Green Mile.

	Yeah, they've been in three movies together... Sinise just had a small part in 'The Green Mile,' though.

questions.correct: The Big Lebowski & Barton Fink & The Hudsucker Proxy & Monsters, Inc.
questions.explanation:
The Big Lebowski & Barton Fink & The Hudsucker Proxy & Monsters, Inc.

	In 'The Big Lebowski,' they play the Dude's bowling buddies.

Bowfinger.

	'Bowfinger' is, in my opinion, a hilarious movie. It's about an unsuccesful movie producer (Martin) who wants the greatest action star in Hollywood (Murphy) to be in his movie. Murphy refuses, so they start shooting the movie, with him in it, with him not knowing!

questions.text: Robert De Niro and Jason Alexander
questions.correct: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle & Rocky and Bullwinkle
questions.explanation:
The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle & Rocky and Bullwinkle.

	Who would have guessed? They both starred as cartoon characters-turned human in the 2000 movie, 'The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle.'

questions.text: Here's a threesome: Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau, and Kevin Pollak
questions.correct: Grumpy Old Men & Grumpier Old Men
questions.explanation:
Grumpy Old Men & Grumpier Old Men.

	In 'Grumpy Old Men' and 'Grumpier Old Men,' Lemmon and Matthau played warring neighbors, while Pollak played Matthau's son. He's such a jolly guy, he really is, Kevin Pollak.

questions.text: Matthew Perry and Kevin Pollak, the first one that is.
questions.correct: The Whole Nine Yards & the whole 9 yards
questions.explanation:
The Whole Nine Yards & the whole 9 yards.

	This is a funny movie featuring Matthew Perry and Bruce Willis. Kevin Pollak plays the evil mob boss.

questions.correct: The Whole Nine Yards & The Kid
questions.explanation:
The Whole Nine Yards & The Kid.

	Perry appears uncredited in 'The Kid.'

The Princess Bride.

	This is one of the greatest movies ever made. I love Cary Elwes as an actor.
